detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract DigitechNetwork (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DigitechNetwork.sol#85-197) has payable functions:
	 - DigitechNetwork.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DigitechNetwork.sol#96-98)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
